# 新增64分屏,兼容旧版本新建表存
update mosaic set channels=X'' where layout_mode=16384;


CREATE TABLE "main"."mosaic_custom_64Screen" ("name" text NOT NULL,"screen" integer NOT NULL,"type" integer,"row" integer,"column" integer,"positions" blob,"channels" blob,PRIMARY KEY ("name", "screen"));
CREATE TABLE "main"."layout_custom_64Screen" ("screen" integer NOT NULL, "name" TEXT NOT NULL, "type" integer NOT NULL, "page" integer NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("screen"));
